metadata.title: CVE-2024-10963 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in pam_access, where certain rules in its configurationfile are mistakenly treated as hostnames. This vulnerability allowsattackers to trick the system by pretending to be a trusted hostname,gaining unauthorized access. This issue poses a risk for systems that relyon this feature to control who can access certain services or terminals.

criterions.comment: pam package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
